title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout again, the original image is still displayed and not refreshed.
EB: After importing a new image into the layout again, the new image should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR: 1. Import a new image ('image1.jpg') into the layout again and observe that the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
